pkgmetadata.longdescription: Small Area Estimation with Measurement Error using Hierarchical Bayesian Method // Implementation of small area estimation using Hierarchical Bayesian (HB) Method when auxiliary variable measured with error. The 'rjags' package is employed to obtain parameter estimates. For the references, see Rao and Molina (2015) doi:10.1002/9781118735855, Ybarra and Lohr (2008) doi:10.1093/biomet/asn048, and Ntzoufras (2009, ISBN-10: 1118210352).
